Are there any sirens in the New Hanover,Brunswick,Pender; counties that are utilized for hurricanes and or tornados?
text:
There
aren't any sirens specifically for hurricanes or tornadoes, according
to local emergency management listings. There is a network of warning
sirens in the areas around the Brunswick Nuclear Plant that would be
used in the event of an emergency at the plant.
